title: Lead apron during x-ray; required
context: [ยง448-1.5] Lead apron during x-ray; required. (a) A dentist shall cover a patient&rsquo;s torso from the neck to the pelvis including the genital area with a lead apron while conducting an x-ray procedure on the patient. (b) The board of dental examiners, by rule adopted pursuant to chapter 91, shall establish minimum specifications for the lead apron; provided that the lead apron shall protect the patient&rsquo;s body from unnecessary exposure to x-rays yet not unduly discomfort the patient. &copy; Any violation of this section shall be considered an improper conduct in the practice of dentistry for the purpose of section 448-17.
